original_text: You know that a person like that has chosen not to believe the true message. He knows that he is doing a bad thing, but he continues to do it.
korean_text: 이러한 사람은 네가 아는 바와 같이 부패하여 스스로 정죄한 자로서 죄를 짓느니라

sentences.original_text: You know that a person like that
has chosen not to believe the true message
sentences.korean_translation: 진실된 메시지를 믿지 않기로 선택했다는 것을 압니다

sentences.original_text: He knows that he is doing a bad thing
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신이 나쁜 일을 하고 있다는 것을 압니다

sentences.original_text: but he continues to do it
